title: D4 Supp Main LF Team

embed.description: LoL Stats! Check your Summoner, MMR, Live Spectate and using powerful global League of Legends Statistics!

body:
My name is Phillipp. I'm 18 years old and currently living in Germany.
I speak fluent english and german.
I've been playing LoL for about 4 to 5 years by now. Ever since then I'm a main support.

Whenever I have some free time to spend on random stuff I mostly choose to Coach LoL to any ELO player.
Within my "LoL career" I had the chance to scrim against LCS Teams, getting coached by ex LCS Coaches, coaching more than 40 players myself and I've tried streaming on twitch where I got 20+ viewer on a daily basis after 2 weeks streaming. [to me that sounds like I'm a nice guy :)]

feel free to hit me up.

ingame: Phiiiipp
email: hobbit24.08@gmail.com

(you are also allowed to use the comment section)

With best regards,

Phillipp {{champion:432}} 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
